Title: Kaboom!  The MVVM framework for the web...
Description: Kaboom makes it possible to create RIA applications using the MVVM design pattern. It's developed in JavaScript and is made to leverage jQuery, JSON, and aspMVC.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Kaboom makes it possible to create RIA applications using the MVVM design pattern. It's developed in JavaScript and is made to leverage jQuery, JSON, and aspMVC.

Kaboom attempts to disprove the claim that MVVM is just a "work around" for Silverlight and WPF development.

Source code is currently on downloads page: http://kaboom.codeplex.com/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=29146.
